title: Securities eligible for deposit
context: ยง431:7-303 Securities eligible for deposit. All deposits shall consist of cash or other assets comprised of securities which are eligible for the investment of the funds of insurers under section 431:6-301 representing public obligations, and section 431:6-302 representing corporate obligations. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2; am L 1989, c 195, ยง17]
